title: I won my Promos But Didn't Promote

embed.description: YujoSeon / Bronze 2 100LP / 141W 149L Win Ratio 49% / Lee Sin - 11W 15L Win Ratio 42%, Jhin - 11W 13L Win Ratio 46%, Ekko - 8W 11L Win Ratio 42%, Lucian - 6W 11L Win Ratio 35%, Thresh - 5W 12L Win Ratio 29%

body: Hi, i recently won the first 2 games of my promos to bronze 1 (impressive ik /s) however i did not promote after this happened. I believe i had previously entered promos so i had the first free win. Was wondering if this was a bug or not, thanks for any replies.

replies.body: I've got your match history pulled up now, and it looks like you just recently started your promo to Bronze 1 and only have one match played so far. You won that first game though, so you're on the track to that promotion!
I thought I had been in promos before and had the first win free. Anyway, thanks for the help :D
